property.name: productImageSetResources
property.description: A collection of product image set resources.

property.name: imageSets
property.description: A collection of image sets for a product.

property.name: name
property.description: The name of an entity (e.g., user, category, product, role).

property.name: images
property.description: A collection of images for a product or entity.

property.name: locale
property.description: The locale context for a request or entity, affecting language and regional formats.

property.name: externalUrlLarge
property.description: The URL for a large version of an image.

property.name: externalUrlSmall
property.description: The URL for a small version of an image.

property.name: productImageSets
property.description: A collection of product image sets.

property.name: productImageSetConditions
property.description: Conditions for filtering product image sets.

property.name: skus
property.description: A collection of Stock Keeping Units (SKUs).

property.name: localeNames
property.description: A collection of locale names.

property.name: sku
property.description: The Stock Keeping Unit, a unique identifier for a concrete product.

property.name: productImages
property.description: A collection of product images.

property.name: locale
property.description: The locale context for a request or entity, affecting language and regional formats.

property.name: type
property.description: The type or category of an entity (e.g., 'allow', 'deny', 'page').

property.name: attributes
property.description: A set of key-value pairs describing a product or entity.

property.name: relationships
property.description: A collection of relationships between resources.

property.name: localeName
property.description: The name of a locale, such as "en_US" or "de_DE".

property.name: resources
property.description: A collection of data entities in a REST API.

property.name: locale
property.description: The locale context for a request or entity, affecting language and regional formats.
